channel.title: People or puppets?
channel.description:
Discussions of values and ethics, modern versus traditional. Faculty from Union Theological Seminary, authors Kenneth Burke and Geoffrey Wagner, critics Edmund Fuller and Martin Dworkin, Dr. Solon Kimball and broadcaster Edward Stanley are featured.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: So what's so funny?
item.description: So what's so funny? The sick joke and the functions of humor.
